items.name: Southbound
explicitMods: Adds 60 to 88 Cold Damage to Attacks
12% increased maximum Life
+42% to Cold Resistance
100% increased Freeze Duration on Enemies
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Incandescent Heart
explicitMods: 226% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+88 to maximum Life
0.8% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain 20% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
21% increased Light Radius
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life
flavourText: Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

socketedItems.secDescrText: Launches unpredictable sparks with that move randomly with large differences in speed and distance until they hit an enemy or expire.

Fires 8 Projectiles

items.name: Nebulis
explicitMods: 16% increased Cast Speed
19% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75%
20% increased Lightning Damage per 1% Lightning Resistance above 75%

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.00 seconds
20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
25% less Elemental Damage taken
25% less Physical Damage taken
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 38 or lower
Supported Skills deal 65% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 400 Mana while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 19% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Maximum 4 Stages
Buff grants 7 to 141 Added Lightning Damage per Stage
Minimum 1 second between Stages
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: 30% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 10% increased Damage taken to Enemies
145% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +17 to Intelligence
30% increased Lightning Damage
33% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

and experience true freedom.

+0.2 metres to radius

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which adds lightning damage to spells and attacks. The damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

Cannot inflict Shock
Herald of Thunder's Storms Hit Enemies with 20% increased Frequency
Base duration is 6.00 seconds
Storm Hits an Enemy every 0.25 Seconds
Creates a storm when you Kill a Shocked Enemy

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 30% of Overkill Damage
40% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 13% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.
